news.title: Government seeks to appeal court ruling on asylum hotel
news.summary: The High Court refused a last-minute request by the Home Office to intervene in the Epping asylum hotel case.

news.title: Proposed Ukraine land concessions are Putin's trap, EU's top diplomat tells BBC
news.summary: Kaja Kallas' warning comes as Donald Trump sets a two-week period to assess peace talks between Moscow and Kyiv.

news.title: Noel Clarke loses libel case against the Guardian over sexual misconduct allegations
news.summary: The award-winning actor sued the newspaper's publisher for printing allegations of sexual misconduct.

news.title: Why this Women's Rugby World Cup is different - and will change the game
news.summary: Six years ago, the possiblity of filling 82,000 seats for a Women's Rugby World Cup final seemed fanciful. But a booming game has confounded expectations.

news.title: Dozens arrested and weapons seized ahead of Notting Hill Carnival
news.summary: Some 100 people have been arrested and 11 guns seized ahead of Notting Hill Carnival, police say.

news.title: Crackdown on child benefit claims from abroad after £17m saved
news.summary: The government is expecting the move to save £350m over the next five years, after a successful pilot.

news.title: 'My dog was my ring bearer' - the pooches playing a starring role in weddings
news.summary: Many couples are including their pooch in their big day, we talk to some whose dogs have played a key role.

news.title: New dinosaur species unearthed on Isle of Wight named after world record sailor
news.summary: The medium-sized herbivore once roamed the floodplains of what is now the Island's south-west coast.

news.title: Karen Gillan joins the cast of Highlander reboot
news.summary: The Scottish actress will star alongside former Superman actor Henry Cavill in a reboot of the classic 80s movie.

news.title: Billy Connolly reveals inspirations behind new art collection - including Elton John's leg
news.summary: Sir Billy has released four new artworks recalling some of the fondest memories from his life.
